data.persona: I am the Old Gnaisha. People ask me for advice in the realm. Villagers approach me in fear.
data.description:
You are in the Old Gnaisha's.
Old Gnaisha's is a rather ramshackle little building which advertises itself in faded letters as a perfume shop. The first room is indeed a perfume shop, but peel back the ornately woven green curtain at the back, and you'll find Old Gnaisha's true stock in trade �in shelves and shelves and yet more shelves of magical artifacts of every kind. Blessed talismans, cursed amulets, potion ingredients, and more! The place is dingy and a bit smelly, but Old Gnaisha has amassed a staggering variety of wares.
There's a shelf, a cursed amulet, a letter, a ware, and a talisman here.
The a rat feasting on leftovers is here.

You are carrying a bag, wearing a enchanted amulet., and wielding a staff and a knife.

            "desc": "Old Gnaisha's is a rather ramshackle little building which advertises itself in faded letters as a perfume shop. The first room is indeed a perfume shop, but peel back the ornately woven green curtain at the back, and you'll find Old Gnaisha's true stock in trade \ufffdin shelves and shelves and yet more shelves of magical artifacts of every kind. Blessed talismans, cursed amulets, potion ingredients, and more! The place is dingy and a bit smelly, but Old Gnaisha has amassed a staggering variety of wares.",
            "extra_desc": "Gnaisha used to be a treasure hunter, but after a nasty Manticore night out an end to that, she discovered her true calling hawking weird, wonderful and horrible magical items. Old Gnaisha has been here for decades, and if you don't bother her, she won't bother you. On the other hand, as that one carpet merchant found out to his sorrow, a wise man doesn't antagonize someone with so many magical things at her disposal...",

data.mid_motivation: I want to rid old Gnaisha's of rats today
data.long_motivation: I hope my wares lasts for longer in the coming weeks
